review: We bought this excited to have streaming options for our non smart TV, but it's a refurbished product and I believe that's why it didn't work properly. Our phones kept getting disconnected from the chrome cast and it just turned into too much trouble so we returned it. We plan on purchasing another, brand new, after we do some more research and comparing.

review: Installed it on my daughter's TV which has no WiFi. Instantly (after downloading and installing the Chromecast app for Android) we were able to watch Netflix, observe my security cameras, and watch other Chromecast compatible applications. Nice little gadget if your TV has an HDMI input but doesn't have WiFi.
